html.p: This dashboard and these panels illustrate extracting failed 802.1X wireless user information from a specific location.

search.query: eventtype=cisco-ise-failed-authentication Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | chart count by AuthenticationMethod | rename AuthenticationMethod AS "Authentication Method"

eventtype=cisco-ise-failed-authentication Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" EapAuthentication="EAP-TLS" | stats count by EapAuthentication UserName Address EndPointMACAddress FailureReason | `format_field_names`

eventtype=cisco-ise-failed-authentication Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | fillnull value="NULL" Called_Station_ID EapAuthentication | stats count by EapAuthentication NetworkDeviceGroups NetworkDeviceName NAS_Identifier NAS_Port NAS_IP_Address Called_Station_ID Calling_Station_ID Airespace_Wlan_Id | `format_field_names`
